description: The education minister confirms increases of 5.5% for new starters and 2.75% for all other educators.
title: Isle of Man teachers to be balloted despite pay rise
title_page: Isle of Man teachers to be balloted despite pay rise - BBC News
maintext: Damien McNulty, a member of the NASUWT's national executive, said: "While we welcome the commitment to honour the pay rise in line with England, as recommended by the STRB, our expectation is that it would be a fully funded pay award and not found through efficiency savings.
